meanings.definition: A person or thing that is essential or central to an activity or organization.
meanings.sent1: The kingpin of the team always makes sure everyone knows their role.
meanings.sent2: The kingpin of the company's success is its innovative products.
meanings.sent3: Without the kingpin, the project would fall apart like a puzzle missing its main piece.
meanings.sent4: She was the kingpin of the dance group, holding everyone together like the glue.
meanings.sent5: The kingpin of the operation was the mastermind behind the entire plan.

meanings.definition: A person in a position of authority or influence.
meanings.sent1: The kingpin of the neighborhood was respected by all for his wisdom.
meanings.sent2: As the kingpin of the organization, he had the final say in all decisions.
meanings.sent3: The kingpin of the book club always had the best recommendations for reads.
meanings.sent4: She became the kingpin of the group, leading with grace and strength.
meanings.sent5: In the business world, the kingpin is the one who calls the shots.
